recipesJson.name: Mrs. Claus dirty melon milk
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description:
Okay I'll be the first to admit this is some weird shit! 

Insanely creamy on the inhale, with a sweet and juicy melon top note, in the middle of the vape, you are hit with an insane amount of delicious vanilla, that blends in flawlessly with FLV peach, the edition of FLV cinnamon gives it a spicy counterpoint, to all the creamy, sweet, deliciousness that is going on. 

Steeping

can't really give you any steeping notes, I literally made this a few hours ago, just so good I couldn't wait to share it.

Substitutions

Super sweet can be substituted out for whatever your preferred sweetener. Or just leave it out if that's not your thing. 

FLV Rich cinnamon, there are a number of cinnamons that could work here, FLV fire cinnamon is next on my list to try, I think it just might fit the profile better. If cinnamon is not your thing, nutmeg, cardamom, Ginger, and clove should all provide a nice contrast to the recipe.

FLV cream- 000 creamy milky undertones

reviews.text: I found this to be fantastic. Spiced melon is definately not something that I would have thought of but is one that I will mix up again.
I would have never thought to put these flavors together but im glad you did cause im diggin it.
